subject: Missing clutch haptic bracket – no response after photos sent
description_text: So i never heard from you guys again after you asked for photos of the missing clutch bracket and now the couriers invoice for taxes came… how do we solve this? I don’t want to pay taxes for an order thats incomplete and ignored at the support even after it said 0 taxes and 0 shipment.

conversations.body_text: Hi Matteneox,  Our Christmas event is now officially underway!

Okey then I’ll wait until I see more discounted.  ?
Thank you. 

> 17 dec. 2025 kl. 03:23 skrev support@simsonn.com:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi Matteneox,
> 
> Our Christmas event is now officially underway! 
> 
> 
>
Hi Matteneox,    You can use this $30 Christmas discount: CRSM30 or a special 10% discount: CART10

Oh thank you. With that 10% I felt I could buy the plate also haha. Don’t want to take a chance and feel like it’s better with that mounted on my rig. Now for the awful waiting until it arrives ?
Kind regards 

> 17 dec. 2025 kl. 07:34 skrev support@simsonn.com:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi Matteneox,
> 
> You can use this $30 Christmas discount: CRSM30 or a special 10% discount: CART10
> 
> 
> 
>
Hi Matteneox,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Please provide a photo, and we will arrange a replacement shipment as soon as possible after verifying the situation at our warehouse.

Photo of what? I’ll send 2. One of the empty plastic where it would have been and one of the not assembled on the pedals. 
Merry Christmas! 



Kind regards.

ID 号为 8415 和 9002 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8415  
      主题:   
      描述:  Hello.  
 I’m really curious about your pedals more specifically  
 
  

  
   
 Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback 
 simsonn.com 
   

  
 
 
   
 But I know I can’t wait and know I shouldn’t buy new pedals haha but I have to check if you’re going have any more discounts after Christmas so it might be better to wait?  
 Kind regards.

合并来自工单9002  
      主题: Order #SSN4964  
      描述:  Hello. Just recieved my things and saw that the metalpart i need to connect the haptic motor to the clutch is missing. Both U parts for the accelerator and brake are there but the cut out for the longer for the clutch are missing sadly.   
 OrderNr: SSN4964 
   
 Kinds regards.
Hi Matteneox,    I'm sorry I didn't send you a replacement in time.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047241369474

Thank you! 


Kind regards.
